printed_text:
Players cannot trash this ice.
[subroutine] Look at the top 5 cards of R&D. You may install 1 of those cards, ignoring the install cost.
[subroutine] You may install 1 card from Archives or HQ.
stripped_printed_text: Players cannot trash this ice. Subroutine Look at the top 5 cards of R&D. You may install 1 of those cards, ignoring the install cost. Subroutine You may install 1 card from Archives or HQ.

printed_text: Gain 1[credit] for each rezzed piece of ice.
stripped_printed_text: Gain 1 credit for each rezzed piece of ice.

printed_text: Place 2 power counters on Labyrinthine Servers when you score it. Hosted power counter: Prevent the Runner from jacking out. The Runner cannot jack out for the remainder of this run.
stripped_printed_text: Place 2 power counters on Labyrinthine Servers when you score it. Hosted power counter: Prevent the Runner from jacking out. The Runner cannot jack out for the remainder of this run.

flavor: The way past is to go a different way.
printed_text: Ashigaru gains "[subroutine] End the run." for each card in HQ.
stripped_printed_text: Ashigaru gains "Subroutine End the run." for each card in HQ.

printed_text: Hosted power counter: Do 1 net damage. Use this ability only during a run. [subroutine] Do 1 net damage. [subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, place 1 power counter on Mamba.
stripped_printed_text: Hosted power counter: Do 1 net damage. Use this ability only during a run. Subroutine Do 1 net damage. Subroutine You and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, place 1 power counter on Mamba.

flavor: Making a name for yourself has its perks. But it also makes you a target.
printed_text:
You can advance this asset.
[click], [trash]: The Runner loses 4[credit] for each hosted advancement counter.
stripped_printed_text: You can advance this asset. click, trash: The Runner loses 4 credits for each hosted advancement counter.

flavor: "It's a small one-time fee, apparently. Only I've paid it seventeen times."
printed_text:
[subroutine] If the Runner is not tagged, they lose 1[credit]. If the Runner is tagged, they lose all credits in their credit pool and you trash this ice.
<errata>Errata from CR 1.4</errata>
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine If the Runner is not tagged, they lose 1 credit. If the Runner is tagged, they lose all credits in their credit pool and you trash this ice. Errata from CR 1.4

printed_text: When your turn begins, you may add 1 rezzed card to HQ and gain credits equal to its rez cost.
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, you may add 1 rezzed card to HQ and gain credits equal to its rez cost.

printed_text: Changeling can be advanced. While Changeling has an odd number of advancement tokens on it, it gains sentry and loses barrier. [subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: Changeling can be advanced. While Changeling has an odd number of advancement tokens on it, it gains sentry and loses barrier. Subroutine End the run.

flavor: If the clones were nervous about living in a repurposed fuel tank, they never mentioned it.
printed_text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Trash any number of cards from HQ. Gain 2[credit] for each card trashed.
stripped_printed_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Trash any number of cards from HQ. Gain 2 credits for each card trashed.

printed_text:
When your turn begins, you may add 1 card from Archives to the bottom of R&D.
Limit 1 per deck.
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, you may add 1 card from Archives to the bottom of R&D. Limit 1 per deck.

printed_text:
[click], [click]: Place 1 power counter on Docklands Crackdown.
The install cost of the first card the Runner installs each turn is increased by 1 for each power counter on Docklands Crackdown.
stripped_printed_text: click, click: Place 1 power counter on Docklands Crackdown. The install cost of the first card the Runner installs each turn is increased by 1 for each power counter on Docklands Crackdown.

flavor: "Knowledge comes in many different shapes and sizes." -Quetzal
printed_text: Reveal the top 4 cards of your stack and trash all programs revealed. Gain 1[credit] for each program trashed, and add the rest of the revealed cards to your grip.
stripped_printed_text: Reveal the top 4 cards of your stack and trash all programs revealed. Gain 1 credit for each program trashed, and add the rest of the revealed cards to your grip.

flavor: The earliest instances of data folding were inspired by the traditional art of origami. Just as a crease pattern is the blueprint of a paper crane, there is a sequence to data that must be considered in order to achieve the greatest result.
printed_text: Your maximum hand size is increased by 1 for each copy of Origami installed.
stripped_printed_text: Your maximum hand size is increased by 1 for each copy of Origami installed.

flavor: "You should have known better than to scratch it…" -Quetzal
printed_text: Whenever the Corp purges virus counters, he or she loses 2[credit], if able.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Corp purges virus counters, he or she loses 2 credits, if able.

flavor: It practically runs itself, unless you're in a pinch.
printed_text:
The first time you install a program from your grip during your turn, gain [click].
Trash Autoscripter if you make an unsuccessful run.
stripped_printed_text: The first time you install a program from your grip during your turn, gain click. Trash Autoscripter if you make an unsuccessful run.

flavor: Small. Compact. Easy to slip by monitoring programs and it can do some damage.
printed_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break any number of sentry subroutines. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card. 1[credit]: +7 strength. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break any number of sentry subroutines. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card. 1 credit: +7 strength. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card.

printed_text:
As an additional cost to play this event, trash an installed piece of hardware.
Gain credits equal to half the install cost of the trashed hardware (rounded down) and search your stack for a piece of hardware, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.
stripped_printed_text: As an additional cost to play this event, trash an installed piece of hardware. Gain credits equal to half the install cost of the trashed hardware (rounded down) and search your stack for a piece of hardware, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.

flavor: "There is no better tool for charting the empty spaces of the net." -Nasir Meidan
printed_text: +1[mu] Draw 1 card whenever the Corp creates a server. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_printed_text: +1 mu Draw 1 card whenever the Corp creates a server. Limit 1 console per player.

flavor: "Low gravity sports are wildly popular, so match-fixing has proven wildly profitable." -Leela Patel
printed_text: Place X power counters on Angel Arena when it is installed. When there are no power counters left on Angel Arena, trash it. Hosted power counter: Reveal the top card of your stack. You may add that card to the bottom of your stack.
stripped_printed_text: Place X power counters on Angel Arena when it is installed. When there are no power counters left on Angel Arena, trash it. Hosted power counter: Reveal the top card of your stack. You may add that card to the bottom of your stack.
